title: Neuro-Symbolic Methods for Times Series Analysis for Edge
data:
R Torres, R Chacon, J Duran- Time Series Analysis-Frontiers in Research and, 2025
This chapter explores methodologies for time series analysis based on the Neuro-
symbolic Artificial Intelligence paradigm, combining pattern recognition, knowledge 
representation, and logical reasoning abilities to improve the effectiveness and 
verification of AI applications. Despite its promise, Neuro-symbolic AI is still in its 
early stages and lacks widespread adoption. Taxonomies play a critical role in 
organizing this field, providing conceptual frameworks that help researchers
